long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn any screen into a digital signage screen by downloading this app and remotely manage your screens contents from our portal: http://app.optisigns.com

• Transform an screen into a digital sign
• Remotely update and manage screens
• Display any images, videos, or documents
• Create beautiful Instagram, Facebook and other social media walls
• Create custom playlists
• Schedule when your content is displayed
